Name: Cuban Island
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The Daiquiri meets the Wet Martini.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Di Vino's, Hong Kong.
Nutrition: One serving of Cuban Island contains 170 calories
